job.title: Front End Software Engineer
job.description:
Location: REMOTE

Salary: FULL TIME - w2

Description: Our client is currently seeking a Full Time 100% remote Front End Software Engineer role. This position is an immediate need and the qualified candidate will have strong experience working with React, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, as well as Familiarity with .NET, Cloud Technologies and other JavaScript Libraries. This client is local to the West Coast and candidates must work on PST time.

If you or anyone you know would be interested please send me your resume directly to rpetras@judge.com with the best time to connect.

Contact: rpetras@judge.com

This job and many more are available through The Judge Group. Find us on the web at www.judge.com
